ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah,- their deeds will Allah render astray (from their mark).
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi aḍalla a`mālahum

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَءَامَنُوا۟ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَأَصْلَحَ بَالَهُمْ
ayas.translation: But those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and believe in the (Revelation) sent down to Muhammad - for it is the Truth from their Lord,- He will remove from them their ills and improve their condition.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wa-āmanū bimā nuzzila `alā muḥammadin wahuwal ḥaqqu min rabbihim kaffara `anhum sayyi-ātihim wa-aṣlaḥa bālahum

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: This because those who reject Allah follow vanities, while those who believe follow the Truth from their Lord: Thus does Allah set forth for men their lessons by similitudes.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annal ladhīna kafarut-taba`ul bāṭila wa-annal ladhīna āmanut-taba`ul ḥaqqa min rabbihim ۚ kadhālika yaḍribullāhu linnāsi amthālahum

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَضَرْبَ ٱلرِّقَابِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَثْخَنتُمُوهُمْ فَشُدُّوا۟ ٱلْوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنًّۢا بَعْدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَآءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ ٱلْحَرْبُ أَوْزَارَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَٱنتَصَرَ مِنْهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَبْلُوَا۟ بَعْضَكُم بِبَعْضٍ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Therefore, when ye meet the Unbelievers (in fight), smite at their necks; At length, when ye have thoroughly subdued them, bind a bond firmly (on them): thereafter (is the time for) either generosity or ransom: Until the war lays down its burdens. Thus (are ye commanded): but if it had been Allah's Will, He could certainly have exacted retribution from them (Himself); but (He lets you fight) in order to test you, some with others. But those who are slain in the Way of Allah,- He will never let their deeds be lost.
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhā laqītumul ladhīna kafarū faḍarbar riqābi ḥattā idhā athkhantumūhum fashuddul wathāqa fa-immā mannan ba`du wa immā fidā-an ḥattā taḍa`al ḥarbu awzārahā ۚ dhālika walaw yashā-ullāhu lantaṣara minhum walākin liyabluwa ba`ḍakum biba`ḍ ۗ wal ladhīna qutilū fī sabīlillāhi falan yuḍilla a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: سَيَهْدِيهِمْ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Soon will He guide them and improve their condition,
ayas.transliteration: sayahdīhim wayuṣliḥu bālahum

ayas.arabic: وَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: And admit them to the Garden which He has announced for them.
ayas.transliteration: wayudkhiluhumul jannata `arrafahā lahum

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تَنصُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! If ye will aid (the cause of) Allah, He will aid you, and plant your feet firmly.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū in tanṣurullāha yanṣurkum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَتَعْسًا لَّهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: But those who reject (Allah),- for them is destruction, and (Allah) will render their deeds astray (from their mark).
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū fata`sal lahum wa-aḍalla a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: That is because they hate the Revelation of Allah; so He has made their deeds fruitless.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzalallāhu fa-aḥbaṭa a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْثَـٰلُهَا
ayas.translation: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the End of those before them (who did evil)? Allah brought utter destruction on them, and similar (fates await) those who reject Allah.
ayas.transliteration: afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul ladhīna min qablihim ۚ dammarallāhu `alayhim ۖ walilkāfirīna amthāluhā

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوْلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَأَنَّ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: That is because Allah is the Protector of those who believe, but those who reject Allah have no protector.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha mawlal ladhīna āmanū wa-annal kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَّهُمْ
ayas.translation: Verily Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds, to Gardens beneath which rivers flow; while those who reject Allah will enjoy (this world) and eat as cattle eat; and the Fire will be their abode.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wal ladhīna kafarū yatamatta`ūna waya-kulūna kamā ta-kulul-an`āmu wan nāru mathwan lahum

ayas.arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ هِىَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةً مِّن قَرْيَتِكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: And how many cities, with more power than thy city which has driven thee out, have We destroyed (for their sins)? and there was none to aid them.
ayas.transliteration: waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatikal latī akhrajatka ahlaknāhum falā nāṣira lahum

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُم
ayas.translation: Is then one who is on a clear (Path) from his Lord, no better than one to whom the evil of his conduct seems pleasing, and such as follow their own lusts?
ayas.transliteration: afaman kāna `alā bayyinatim min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu sū-u `amalihi wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum

ayas.arabic: مَّثَلُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَآ أَنْهَـٰرٌ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيْرِ ءَاسِنٍ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌ مِّن لَّبَنٍ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُۥ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌ مِّنْ خَمْرٍ لَّذَّةٍ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌ مِّنْ عَسَلٍ مُّصَفًّى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَـٰلِدٌ فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَسُقُوا۟ مَآءً حَمِيمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَآءَهُمْ
ayas.translation: (Here is) a Parable of the Garden which the righteous are promised: in it are rivers of water incorruptible; rivers of milk of which the taste never changes; rivers of wine, a joy to those who drink; and rivers of honey pure and clear. In it there are for them all kinds of fruits; and Grace from their Lord. (Can those in such Bliss) be compared to such as shall dwell for ever in the Fire, and be given, to drink, boiling water, so that it cuts up their bowels (to pieces)?
ayas.transliteration: mathalul jannatil latī wu`idal muttaqūn ۖ fīhā anhārun min mā-in ghayri āsinin wa-anhārun min labanin lam yataghayyar ṭa`muhu wa-anhārun min khamrin ladhhatin lishhāribīna wa-anhārun min `asalin muṣaffā ۖ walahum fīhā min kullith thamarāti wa maghfiratun min rabbihim ۖ kaman huwa khālidun fin nāri wasuqū mā-an ḥamīman faqaṭṭa`a am`ā-ahum

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُوا۟ مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ
ayas.translation: And among them are men who listen to thee, but in the end, when they go out from thee, they say to those who have received Knowledge, "What is it he said just then?" Such are men whose hearts Allah has sealed, and who follow their own lusts.
ayas.transliteration: wa minhum man yastami`u ilayka ḥattā idhā kharajū min `indika qālū lilladhīna ūtul `il-ma mādhā qāla ānifā ۚ ulā-ikal ladhīna ṭaba`allāhu `alā qulūbihim wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَءَاتَىٰهُمْ تَقْوَىٰهُمْ
ayas.translation: But to those who receive Guidance, He increases the (light of) Guidance, and bestows on them their Piety and Restraint (from evil).
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīnah-tadaw zādahum hudan wa-ātāhum taqwāhum

ayas.arabic: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَىٰهُمْ
ayas.translation: Do they then only wait for the Hour,- that it should come on them of a sudden? But already have come some tokens thereof, and when it (actually) is on them, how can they benefit then by their admonition?
ayas.transliteration: fahal yanẓurūna illas sā`ata an ta-tiyahum baghtah ۖ faqad jā-a ashrāṭuhā ۚ fa-annā lahum idhā jā-at hum dhikrāhum

ayas.arabic: فَٱعْلَمْ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَىٰكُمْ
ayas.translation: Know, therefore, that there is no god but Allah, and ask forgiveness for thy fault, and for the men and women who believe: for Allah knows how ye move about and how ye dwell in your homes.
ayas.transliteration: fa`lam annahu lā ilāha illallāhu wastaghfir lidhanbika walil-mu-minīna wal mu-mināt ۗ wallāhu ya`lamu mutaqallabakum wa mathwākum

ayas.arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌ ۖ فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ مُّحْكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ ٱلْمَغْشِىِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Those who believe say, "Why is not a sura sent down (for us)?" But when a sura of basic or categorical meaning is revealed, and fighting is mentioned therein, thou wilt see those in whose hearts is a disease looking at thee with a look of one in swoon at the approach of death. But more fitting for them-
ayas.transliteration: wayaqūlul ladhīna āmanū lawlā nuzzilat sūrah ۖ fa-idhā unzilat sūratun muḥkamatun wadhukira fīhal qitālu ra-aytal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun yanẓurūna ilayka naẓaral maghshiyyi `alayhi minal mawt ۖ fa-awlā lahum

ayas.arabic: طَاعَةٌ وَقَوْلٌ مَّعْرُوفٌ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ
ayas.translation: Were it to obey and say what is just, and when a matter is resolved on, it were best for them if they were true to Allah.
ayas.transliteration: ṭā`atun waqawlun ma`rūf ۚ fa-idhā `azamal-amru falaw ṣadaqullāha lakāna khayral lahum

ayas.arabic: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓا۟ أَرْحَامَكُمْ
ayas.translation: Then, is it to be expected of you, if ye were put in authority, that ye will do mischief in the land, and break your ties of kith and kin?
ayas.transliteration: fahal `asaytum in tawallaytum an tufsidū fil-arḍi watuqaṭṭi`ū arḥāmakum

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Such are the men whom Allah has cursed for He has made them deaf and blinded their sight.
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ikal ladhīna la`anahumullāhu fa-aṣammahum wa-a`mā abṣārahum

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَآ
ayas.translation: Do they not then earnestly seek to understand the Qur'an, or are their hearts locked up by them?
ayas.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūnal qur-āna am `alā qulūbin aqfāluhā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرْتَدُّوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَـٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَى ۙ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Those who turn back as apostates after Guidance was clearly shown to them,- the Evil One has instigated them and busied them up with false hopes.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīnar-taddū `alā adbārihim min ba`di mā tabayyana lahumul hudash shayṭānu sawwala lahum wa-amlā lahum

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا۟ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِى بَعْضِ ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
ayas.translation: This, because they said to those who hate what Allah has revealed, "We will obey you in part of (this) matter"; but Allah knows their (inner) secrets.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzalallāhu sanuṭī`ukum fī ba`ḍil-amr ۖ wallāhu ya`lamu isrārahum

ayas.arabic: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ
ayas.translation: But how (will it be) when the angels take their souls at death, and smite their faces and their backs?
ayas.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffat-humul malā-ikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَآ أَسْخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا۟ رِضْوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: This because they followed that which called forth the Wrath of Allah, and they hated Allah's good pleasure; so He made their deeds of no effect.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumut-taba`ū mā askhaṭallāha wakarihū riḍwānahu fa-aḥbaṭa a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضْغَـٰنَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease, think that Allah will not bring to light all their rancour?
ayas.transliteration: am ḥasibal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukhrijallāhu aḍghānahum

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيْنَـٰكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِى لَحْنِ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ
ayas.translation: Had We so wiled, We could have shown them up to thee, and thou shouldst have known them by their marks: but surely thou wilt know them by the tone of their speech! And Allah knows all that ye do.
ayas.transliteration: walaw nashā-u la-araynākahum fala`araftahum bisīmāhum ۚ walata`rifannahum fī laḥnil qawl ۚ wallāhu ya`lamu a`mālakum

ayas.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ ٱلْمُجَـٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَا۟ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
ayas.translation: And We shall try you until We test those among you who strive their utmost and persevere in patience; and We shall try your reported (mettle).
ayas.transliteration: walanabluwannakum ḥattā na`lamal mujāhidīna minkum waṣ ṣābirīna wanabluwa akhbārakum

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًٔا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Those who reject Allah, hinder (men) from the Path of Allah, and resist the Messenger, after Guidance has been clearly shown to them, will not injure Allah in the least, but He will make their deeds of no effect.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi washāqqur rasūla min ba`di mā tabayyana lahumul hudā lan yaḍurrullāha shay-an wasayuḥbiṭu a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوٓا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Obey Allah, and obey the messenger, and make not vain your deeds!
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū aṭī`ullāha wa-aṭī`ur rasūla walā tubṭilū a`mālakum

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ
ayas.translation: Those who reject Allah, and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah, then die rejecting Allah,- Allah will not forgive them.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi thumma mātū wahum kuffārun falan yaghfirallāhu lahum

ayas.arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَتَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ
ayas.translation: Be not weary and faint-hearted, crying for peace, when ye should be uppermost: for Allah is with you, and will never put you in loss for your (good) deeds.
ayas.transliteration: falā tahinū watad`ū ilas sal-mi wa-antumul-a`lawna wallāhu ma`akum walan yatirakum a`mālakum

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْـَٔلْكُمْ أَمْوَٰلَكُمْ
ayas.translation: The life of this world is but play and amusement: and if ye believe and guard against Evil, He will grant you your recompense, and will not ask you (to give up) your possessions.
ayas.transliteration: innamal ḥayātud dunyā la`ibun walahw ۚ wa in tu-minū watattaqū yu-tikum ujūrakum walā yas-alkum amwālakum

ayas.arabic: إِن يَسْـَٔلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا۟ وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَـٰنَكُمْ
ayas.translation: If He were to ask you for all of them, and press you, ye would covetously withhold, and He would bring out all your ill-feeling.
ayas.transliteration: in yas-alkumūhā fayuḥfikum tabkhalū wayukhrij aḍghānakum

ayas.arabic: هَـٰٓأَنتُمْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْغَنِىُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْفُقَرَآءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓا۟ أَمْثَـٰلَكُم
ayas.translation: Behold, ye are those invited to spend (of your substance) in the Way of Allah: But among you are some that are niggardly. But any who are niggardly are so at the expense of their own souls. But Allah is free of all wants, and it is ye that are needy. If ye turn back (from the Path), He will substitute in your stead another people; then they would not be like you!
ayas.transliteration: hā-antum hā-ulā-i tud`awna litunfiqū fī sabīlillāhi faminkum man yabkhal ۖ wa man yabkhal fa-innamā yabkhalu `an nafsih ۚ wallāhul ghaniyyu wa-antumul fuqarā-u ۚ wa in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma lā yakūnū amthālakum
